#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 int t;
 cin>>t;
 char c[1001],s;
 while(t--)
 {
     int a[126]={0};
     cin>>c;
     for(int i=0;c[i]!='\0';i++)
        a[c[i]+ 0]++;
     for(int i=97;i<=122;i++)
     {
         if(a[i]%2 !=0)
         {
             while(a[i]>0)
             {
                 s=i;
                 cout<<s;
                 a[i]--;
             }
         }
     }
     for(int i=97;i<=122;i++)
     {
         if(a[i]%2 ==0)
         {
             while(a[i]>0)
             {
                 s=i;
                 cout<<s;
                 a[i]--;
             }
         }
     }
     cout<<endl;
 }
 return 0;
}
